CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 15, 1939, pg. 7, reads: "Wednesday Bridge Club Hostesses to Beautiful Holiday Event at Loendi - Scenes at the Wednesday Bridge Club's Easter Monday party at Loendi... Top, left to right: a group playing in north room...Mrs. Harold Butler, Mrs. Richard Jones, Mrs. James Stevenson, Mrs. Henri Vaughn, Mrs. Luke McDaniel, Mrs. R. L. Vann, Mrs. Charlotte Catlin, Mrs. Julia Jones... Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women, including Mrs. Harold Butler, Mrs. Richard Jones, Mrs. James Stevenson, Mrs. Henri Vaughn, Mrs. Luke McDaniel, Jessie Vann, Charlotte Enty Catlin wearing hat with netting and flowers near center, and Julia Jones, playing bridge card game in Loendi Club
